## Biography

Travis Watson is a highly skilled and approachable attorney who excels in providing responsive, thorough, and practical legal solutions.

Travis advises and represents clients in the areas of Worker’s Compensation, Construction Law, Insurance Defense, Civil Defense, Business Litigation, Business and Corporate Law, Commercial Litigation, and Family Law. With a depth of knowledge across many areas of the law, Travis is a trusted advisor and advocate, focused on delivering practical legal solutions designed to meet each client’s unique needs.

Travis graduated from the Indiana University Robert H. McKinney School of Law, _summa cum laude_ in May 2020. While attending McKinney, Travis was selected as a Note Candidate for the _Indiana Law Review_ and ultimately, his Note was selected for publication in Volume 53. Travis subsequently served as the Executive Online Editor for the _Indiana Law Review_.

Prior to law school, Travis worked for more than ten years in the construction industry which gives him a unique background and knowledge base in his construction law practice. Travis is a graduate of Indiana University’s Kelley School of Business.

## Beyond the Office

Travis lives in Zionsville with his wife, daughter, and two dogs. In his free time, he enjoys going on road trips, attending concerts, watching the Yankees, and going on hikes with his dogs around Indiana parks. Travis and his family are in the process of attending a game at every MLB stadium (so far, they’ve been to 12/30).
